summary: small mod aimed at giving Dawnstar a secure feel... updated to Version 1.5
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]cybkjZbRfT4[/youtube]

1:20 is where the inspiration came from for this mod...

[u]The Premise[/u]:

 Dragonborn: [i]"I"ve slain the Giant troubling Dawnstar and I claim the bounty (tosses Giant's Toe to the Jarl)[/i]"

 Jarl Skald:[i] " Good work, that should tell the other Giants to stay out of the Pale!"
[/i]
 Dragonborn: [i]"Erm...you have no walls, no moat, not even a respectable fence...how do you keeps things out?"
[/i]
 Jarl Skald: [i]"Well...we have some of the finest soldiers in the Pa.."[/i]

 Dragonborn: [i]"Stop, I've seen your guards get beat by a bear who wandered into town, why don't you have walls?"
[/i]
 Jarl Skald:[i] "Well..we did..a few Eras ago, but stonework is expensive..."
[/i]
 Dragonborn: [i]"There are loads of trees, cut them down, fashion a stockade. The best part is its cheap, and requires no specialized labor."

[/i][u]Version Guide[/u][i]:

[/i]- Version 1.0 is the original file, kept on for old times sake

- Version 1.5 is the new, improved file
        * contains two esp files, use only one!
        * Dawnstar_Fortified V 1.5 is the new file
* Dawnstar_Fortified_Expanded is the version I made to work with  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22644/?]Dawnstar Expanded
[/url]



[u]OTHER FORTIFIED TOWNS AND CITIES by me[/u]:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22575/?]Morthal Fortified
[/url]

[u]Credits[/u]:
thanks to Bethesda and the nexus sites

[u]Permissions[/u]:
can improve or add to in your own game, but no uploading without my permission (all you have to do is ask).

DON"T UPLOAD TO STEAM! If you do I won't support it and the upkeep will be on you
author: modder3434
